title: Neewer IR Remote controller for Canon EOS Rebel SL1/100D,T5i/700D, XSi/450D, XTi/400D, XT/350D, EOS Rebel/300D, EOS 30/33/30V, EOS 50/55,EOS 100, EOS 10, EOS 300V, EOS 300X, 300VQD, EOS IX, IXUS Jr/II/III, SURESHOT, ELAN7, Rebel T1 Date, Rebel T2 Date, Z180u, Z155, 120, 370Z, 370Z, G6, G5, G3, G2, G1, *S70, *S60, S1IS, Pro 1, Pro 90 IS
description: This miniature infrared transmitter operates at ranges of up to 10m, and may be set for either instant shutter release or 2-second delay. You can trigger the shutter without touching the camera body, it can minimize vibrations, thus avoiding blurred image. It's very suitable for nature photography. It also gives you freedom to include yourself in the photo and take picture whenever you are ready. It has been proved to be safe and reliable with compatible cameras , and works with all camera remote control modes (Quick-response, Delayed and Bulb).Features:Compact design and portableThe remote control can trigger your camera shutter from a distanceWireless remote control built-in infrared receiverIt has 2 seconds delay function, so you have time to hide the remote before the camera shoot.CR2025 battery is included and it is replaceableDimension: 85 x 33 x 5 mmWeight: 26GCompatible with :Canon: EOS 100D/700D EOS Rebel XSi 450D, EOS Rebel XTi 400D, EOS XT 350D, EOS Rebel 300D, EOS 30/33/30V, EOS 50/55, EOS kissIII, EOS kissIIIL, EOS 100, EOS 10, EOS 300V, EOS 300X, 300VQD, EOS IX, IXUS Jr/II/III, SURESHOT, ELAN7, Rebel T1 Date, Rebel T2 Date, Z180u, Z155, 120, 370Z, 370Z, G6, G5, G3, G2, G1, *S70, *S60, S1IS, Pro 1, Pro 90 ISOnly shutter replease function for S70 & S60Note:your model may not include in the above list. Please check the manual of you camera to see whether it is compatible with a RC-1 IR remote controller.package content:One Remote controlBattery (pre-installed)One English manual
